name: LimbFight
description:
Welcome to LimbFight! A world ruled by cubes with legs and circles with arms. 

In this beat´em up you control Cub in a journey to defeat the circles with a bunch of moves you can perform.

The controls are very simple:

-Z for light attacks

-X for heavy attacks

-C for a Special attack

-Arrows to move

-SpaceBar to jump

Alternative controls:

-LeftMouse for light attacks

-RightMouse for heavy attacks

-SHIFT for a Special Attack

-WASD to move

-Spacebar to jump

This is only a demo, so you can only play one level. In the future, and with your feedback, we will implement more levels and features.

Thank you for playing and enjoy!
